title: call me by that name
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zAdDPD

by Anonymous

In the absence of any other father figures, Rey takes to calling Ben Solo “Daddy”.

Words: 7644, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

tags: Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series
summary: With time and technology, there are more and more different ways to experience Star Wars. Now thanks to Lucasfilm’s ILMxLab and...
body:
With time and technology, there are more and more different ways to experience Star Wars. Now thanks to Lucasfilm’s ILMxLab and Facebook’s Oculus, there will soon be another. On StarWars.com it was announced that the first episode of Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series will be arriving in 2019. This is the result of a collaboration between the two companies that began in 2016. It will be available exclusively on Facebook’s new Oculus Quest VR headset.

Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series isn’t being billed as a game. Rather, it is being described as an immersive and interactive story. People will be able to enter Darth Vader’s palace on Mustafar and become a part of the action and story themselves. This will be a part of the Star Wars canon and continue Darth Vader’s story. It will take place between the events of Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith and A New Hope. It will also connect to Secrets of the Empire, although it isn’t known how. Inside of Vader’s palace, people will be encountering Darth Vader himself and also wielding a lightsaber.

Facebook’s new Oculus Quest will be available in early 2019. It will go for $399 and will have over 50 games when it launches, including this one.

What do you think of Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series? Are you excited to give it a try when it arrives in 2019? Will you be purchasing an Oculus Quest for this experience? Let us know your thoughts in the comments below. You can also read more about it on starwars.com!

https://www.starwars.com/news/vader-immortal

ILMxLab Announces “Vader Immortal” The First Episode of A Star Wars VR Series Coming Home to Fans with Oculus Quest in 2019 With time and technology, there are more and more different ways to experience Star Wars. Now thanks to Lucasfilm's ILMxLab and Facebook’s Oculus, there will soon be another.

summary: New chapter of my fic Last Known Trajectory!!  Ezra struggles to find his place with the Chiss. There's surprise, frustration,...
body:
New chapter of my fic Last Known Trajectory!! Ezra struggles to find his place with the Chiss. There’s surprise, frustration, danger and loss in this chapter… Here hoping you are ready for it!

LAST KNOWN TRAJECTORY - Chapter 9

Rating: Mature

Relationships: Eventual Eli/Ezra, Thrawn/Chiss OC, Platonic Thranto

Characters: Ezra Bridger, Thrawn, Eli Vanto, Kanan-Dume, Ar'alani, Original Chiss characters.

Other tags: Survival, minor injury, castaways, slow burn, slow plot, hurt, chiss headcanon, chiss politics, chiss intrigue, alien culture, cultural shock, enemies to allies, enemies to friends, platonic Thranto, force shenanigans, force animals, Alliances Spoilers, tags added as needed.

Summary: Ezra and Thrawn end up stranded on an uninhabited planet somewhere in the Unknown Regions. With no rescue on sight, can Ezra put aside his differences with one of his biggest enemies to survive? But most importantly… what is Thrawn’s ulterior motive to push for this unlikely alliance?

https://archiveofourown.org/works/14719869/chapters/37599275

Note: I want to thank rachelrose29 on Ao3 for being the beta reader for this chapter! 🙏😁❤ Posting this again because there seems to be a problem with the previous post not showing on the tag search.

title: A Moment on Rishi
body:

by Induurisa
